text: Mickey Lee Tettleton (born September 16, 1960) is a former Major League Baseball catcher for the Oakland Athletics (1984–1987), Baltimore Orioles (1988–1990), Detroit Tigers (1991–1994) and Texas Rangers (1995–1997). He made two All–Star teams and won three Silver Slugger Awards. He was named after Mickey Mantle, who was also from Oklahoma. ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Category:American baseball players Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma City Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Texas Rangers players
title: Mickey Tettleton
